question: Which of the following Peshwa bore the official title of pant pratinidhi?
explanation: The Peshwas were the hereditary prime ministers of the Maratha rulers. Moropant Trimbak Pingale was the third person to be declared as Peshwa and bore the official title of pant pratinidhi. He was appointed Peshwa by Chhatrapati Shivaji.
